channel.title: Alejandro Sánchez Yalí - Programming, Mathematics, and Technology Blog
channel.description: Welcome to my blog, where I share my notes and insights on programming, mathematics, and technology. From machine learning to software development, I cover a wide range of topics related to computer science and beyond.

item.title: Neural networks represented as DAGs of parameterized computational programs
item.description: Neural networks can be viewed as algorithms with adjustable parameters, optimized through machine learning. This approach allows us to address them from a broader mathematical and computational perspective. In this article, we will explore how to represent these algorithms as directed acyclic graphs (DAGs).
item.author: asanchezyali@gmail.com (Alejandro Sánchez Yalí)
